db:abstract.db:para: The QMediaServiceSupportedFormatsInterface class interface identifies if a media service plug-in supports a media format.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: A QMediaServiceProviderPlugin may implement this interface.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QMediaServiceSupportedFormatsInterface::~QMediaServiceSupportedFormatsInterface()
db:section.db:para: Destroys a media service supported formats interface.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QMultimedia::SupportEstimate QMediaServiceSupportedFormatsInterface::hasSupport(const QString &mimeType, const QStringList &codecs) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the level of support a media service plug-in has for a mimeType and set of codecs.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QStringList QMediaServiceSupportedFormatsInterface::supportedMimeTypes() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a list of MIME types supported by the media service plug-in.
